00038 #ifndef PMEMOBJ_COMMON_HPP
00039 #define PMEMOBJ_COMMON_HPP
00040 
00041 #include "libpmemobj++/detail/pexceptions.hpp"
00042 #include "libpmemobj/tx_base.h"
00043 #include <typeinfo>
00044 
00045 namespace nvml
00046 {
00047 
00048 namespace detail
00049 {
00050 
00051 /*
00052  * Conditionally add an object to a transaction.
00053  *
00054  * Adds `*that` to the transaction if it is within a pmemobj pool and
00055  * there is an active transaction. Does nothing otherwise.
00056  *
00057  * @param[in] that pointer to the object being added to the transaction.
00058  */
00059 template <typename T>
00060 inline void
00061 conditional_add_to_tx(const T *that)
00062 {
00063         /* 'that' is not in any open pool */
00064         if (!pmemobj_pool_by_ptr(that))
00065                 return;
00066 
00067         if (pmemobj_tx_stage() != TX_STAGE_WORK)
00068                 return;
00069 
00070         if (pmemobj_tx_add_range_direct(that, sizeof(*that)))
00071                 throw transaction_error("Could not add an object to the"
00072                                         " transaction.");
00073 }
00074 
00075 /*
00076  * Return type number for given type.
00077  */
00078 template <typename T>
00079 constexpr uint64_t
00080 type_num()
00081 {
00082         return typeid(T).hash_code();
00083 }
00084 
00085 } /* namespace detail */
00086 
00087 } /* namespace nvml */
00088 
00089 #endif /* PMEMOBJ_COMMON_HPP */
